Taupō crash: One person in critical condition after Broadlands truck crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-crash-police-responding-to-incident-broadlands-rd-blocked/EN3SYTBDBVDV3GFL7NTX4BH2NQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-crash-police-responding-to-incident-broadlands-rd-blocked/EN3SYTBDBVDV3GFL7NTX4BH2NQ/ Maryana GarciaEmergency services were called to the scene about 1pm. Thu, 24 Oct 2024 07:27:41 +0000 One person was taken to hospital in critical condition after a truck and car crashed on Broadlands Road, near Taupō.
Onehunga bus attack: Police arrest alleged suspect after 24 hours on the run following female passenger’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/onehunga-bus-attack-police-apprehend-alleged-suspect-after-24-hours-on-the-run-following-female-passengers-death/NVX674JVPZAANNFU5VLZND3Y7Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/onehunga-bus-attack-police-apprehend-alleged-suspect-after-24-hours-on-the-run-following-female-passengers-death/NVX674JVPZAANNFU5VLZND3Y7Y/ Benjamin PlummerThe victim was a bus passenger - she did not know her attacker. Thu, 24 Oct 2024 07:26:22 +0000 Police released an image of Kael Leona after a fatal stabbing on a bus in Onehunga. He was last seen in the area wearing a dark jumper with shoes, he had a green t-shirt on his head and was carrying a black pack. The public were advised not to approach the man. Photo Composite: NZME/NZ Police
Weather: Wellington winds disrupt flights, blast Bluebridge ferry as MetService warns of severe gales https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-wellington-winds-disrupt-flights-blast-bluebridge-ferry-as-metservice-warns-of-severe-gales/LEKCNKJZUJG47DQEI3IH6IXU3A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-wellington-winds-disrupt-flights-blast-bluebridge-ferry-as-metservice-warns-of-severe-gales/LEKCNKJZUJG47DQEI3IH6IXU3A/ A total of 23 flights have been cancelled in and out of Wellington Airport. Thu, 24 Oct 2024 07:11:20 +0000 Wellington Airport says so far there have been 11 inbound cancellations including one international flight from Brisbane diverted to Christchurch, and 12 outbound flights cancelled. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Uncle who raped his niece in Mount Maunganui motel sentenced in Tauranga District Court https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/uncle-who-raped-his-niece-in-mount-maunganui-motel-sentenced-in-tauranga-district-court/DERKTV676JFB5GE7FXDEXSQWRE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/uncle-who-raped-his-niece-in-mount-maunganui-motel-sentenced-in-tauranga-district-court/DERKTV676JFB5GE7FXDEXSQWRE/ Hannah BartlettHe went on to sexually assault another niece, leaving both women traumatised. Thu, 24 Oct 2024 07:00:00 +0000 A man and his niece were staying at a motel at Mount Maunganui when he took her out drinking and then raped her.
Family find animal jawbone inside bag of carrots from Auckland Woolworths https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/family-find-animal-jawbone-inside-bag-of-carrots-from-auckland-woolworths/UM67NQTHRRHA5BDP4ESLVEVGSI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/family-find-animal-jawbone-inside-bag-of-carrots-from-auckland-woolworths/UM67NQTHRRHA5BDP4ESLVEVGSI/ Benjamin PlummerSupermarket operator says it is looking into the incident 'as a matter of priority'. Thu, 24 Oct 2024 06:50:22 +0000 An Auckland family was shocked when they found the jaw of an unidentified animal inside a bag a carrots purchased from a Woolworths supermarket. Photo / Eric Smith
Medicinal cannabis firm Kariki Pharma ordered to pay $240k to former worker over unpaid salary https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/medicinal-cannabis-firm-kariki-pharma-ordered-to-pay-240k-to-former-worker-over-unpaid-salary/MTIBU4BORRDV5LELC3XN2GAVDM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/medicinal-cannabis-firm-kariki-pharma-ordered-to-pay-240k-to-former-worker-over-unpaid-salary/MTIBU4BORRDV5LELC3XN2GAVDM/ Jeremy WilkinsonThe man worked for two years without pay. Thu, 24 Oct 2024 06:47:08 +0000 Medicinal cannabis company Kariki Pharma Ltd must pay a former worker $240,000. Photo / NZME
Yanfei Bao case: Murder accused Tingjun Cao storms out of courtroom during trial https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/yanfei-bao-case-murder-accused-tingjun-cao-storms-out-of-courtroom-during-trial/PMJTUDHQJBHBZPHYHJOJPH2K7U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/yanfei-bao-case-murder-accused-tingjun-cao-storms-out-of-courtroom-during-trial/PMJTUDHQJBHBZPHYHJOJPH2K7U/ Visibly frustrated Tingjun Cao accuses witness of lying. Thu, 24 Oct 2024 06:38:22 +0000 Tingjun Cao, who is accused of murdering Christchurch real estate Yangfei Bao, stormed out of the courtroom at his trial today, accusing a witness of lying.
Taupō emergency services join forces for special fundraiser for I Am Hope https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-emergency-services-join-forces-for-special-fundraiser-for-i-am-hope/WJ6P5G3U4NE3FG2IDNXNJUYF3U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-emergency-services-join-forces-for-special-fundraiser-for-i-am-hope/WJ6P5G3U4NE3FG2IDNXNJUYF3U/ Danielle ZollickhoferA team of 14 first responders join forces for special fundraiser for I am Hope.
